name.baseName: Woolen tea, silkworm cocoon (roasted cocoon) ; Coal gas ; Stove burning ; All sizes; NESPS2
毛茶、蚕茧（烤茧） ; 煤气 ; 炉灶燃烧 ; 所有规模 ; 全国第二次污染普查数据

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideis/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution sulfur dioxideis/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
technology.technologicalApplicability: 该工业过程涉及使用煤气炉燃烧羊毛茶和蚕茧（烤茧）。这个过程的规模可大可小，适用于从小规模到大规模的各种操作。这是一个主要用于丝绸和茶叶行业加工原材料的特定过程。数据集并未提及用于管理二氧化硫或氮氧化物污染的末端管控技术，这表明要么该过程不产生需要这些技术的显著排放，要么这些技术尚未实施。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: 第二次全国污染源普查产排污核算系数手册（试用版）,二级代码05,四级代码0514文件，在完整版文件中第3413页

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: This dataset is derived from the Pollution Source Census Report and contains information on pollution emissions and related products. However, it does not include data on energy or chemical consumption, nor does it provide information on waste or co-product generation. When utilizing this dataset, please supplement the missing data based on actual conditions before use
该数据集来源于污染源普查报告，包含污染物排放及相关产品信息，但不包含能源或化学品消耗数据，也不提供废弃物或共生产物产生信息。在使用该数据集时，请根据实际情况补充缺失数据后再使用。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

common:referenceToPersonOrEntityGenerati.common:shortDescription: The data was created by the Office of the Second National Pollution Source Census of the Ministry of Ecology and Environment, and the data was organized by the TianGong Plan team for ILCD format
生态环境部第二次全国污染源普查工作办公室创建数据，天工计划团队常慧敏整理数据为ILCD格式

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: 源文件中描述为为煤气，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为二氧化硫，产污系数备注为二氧化硫产污系数以煤气和天然气的含硫量(S)形式表示，其中S是气的收到基硫分含量，单位是毫克/立方米。当煤气的含硫量为200毫克/立方米时，产污系数表中S取值200
源文件中描述为为煤气，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为二氧化硫，产污系数备注为二氧化硫产污系数以煤气和天然气的含硫量(S)形式表示，其中S是气的收到基硫分含量，单位是毫克/立方米。当煤气的含硫量为200毫克/立方米时，产污系数表中S取值200
the Technical of end-of-pipe management technology for pollution Nitrogen oxidesis/，Its Technical efficiency of end-of-pipe management0
污染物指标氮氧化物的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为氮氧化物，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为氮氧化物

Pollutant indicator sulfur dioxide end-of-pipe treatment technology is /, its efficiency is 0. The original document describes the pollutant category as exhaust gas, the pollutant indicator is sulfur dioxide, here to match the work of matching it to the LCAflow library of the most compatible streams, pollutant indicator remarks for sulfur dioxide, production coefficient remarks for sulfur dioxide production coefficient of sulfur dioxide in the form of sulfur content of gas and natural gas (S), where S is the gas received (S) expressed, where S is the gas received (S), where S is the sulfur content of gas received (S). Expressed in the form of sulfur content (S) of gas and natural gas, where S is the received base sulfur content of gas, the unit is mg/m3. When the sulfur content of gas is 200 mg/m3, the production coefficient in the table of production coefficients takes the value of S in the original text of 200 and describes the production coefficient as 0.02 S. Please modify the corresponding emission rate after self-calculation according to the remarks.

污染物指标二氧化硫的末端治理技术是/，其效率为0。原文件中描述污染物类别为废气，污染物指标为二氧化硫，此处对其进行了匹配工作，将其匹配到LCAflow库里面相最符合的流，污染物指标备注为二氧化硫，产污系数备注为二氧化硫产污系数以煤气和天然气的含硫量(S)形式表示，其中S是气的收到基硫分含量，单位是毫克/立方米。当煤气的含硫量为200毫克/立方米时，产污系数表中S取值200原文描述的产污系数为 0.02S。请根据备注自行核算后修改对应的排放量。
